recipes.name: Pilau ğŸ›
recipes.steps: 1. Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat. 2. Add onions and garlic and sautÃ© until golden. 3. Stir in cloves and cardamom for 1 minute. 4. Add beef and cook until browned. 5. Add pilau masala and mix well. 6. Add rice and stir to coat with spices. 7. Pour in water and salt, bring to boil. 8. Reduce heat, cover, simmer 18â€“20 min until rice is tender. 9. Fluff rice and serve hot.

recipes.name: Vegetable Pilau ğŸ›ğŸ¥¦
recipes.steps: 1. Heat oil in a pot and sautÃ© onions until soft. 2. Add pilau masala and stir 1 minute. 3. Add carrots, peas, and potatoes and cook 3 minutes. 4. Add rice and mix thoroughly. 5. Add water and salt, bring to boil. 6. Cover and reduce heat, simmer 18â€“22 minutes until rice and veggies are tender. 7. Gently fluff and serve.

recipes.name: Githeri ğŸŒ½ğŸ¥˜
recipes.steps: 1. Rinse maize and beans; soak 4â€“6 hours. 2. Boil maize and beans until soft (~1 hour). 3. In pan, sautÃ© onions, add tomatoes 3 min. 4. Combine with maize and beans, simmer 10 min. 5. Add salt, serve hot.

recipes.name: Ugali ğŸŒ½
recipes.steps: 1. Boil water with salt. 2. Gradually stir in maize flour, keep stirring. 3. Cook 8â€“12 min until thick, pulls away from pot sides. 4. Serve with stew or vegetables.

recipes.name: Sukuma Wiki Stew ğŸ¥¬
recipes.steps: 1. Heat oil, sautÃ© onions until soft. 2. Add tomatoes 3 min. 3. Add sukuma wiki, stir. 4. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Cook 5â€“7 min until tender. 6. Serve with ugali or rice.

recipes.name: Tilapia Fry ğŸŸ
recipes.steps: 1. Rinse and pat dry tilapia. 2. Rub salt, lemon juice, pepper inside/outside. 3. Heat oil in pan. 4. Fry 5â€“7 min per side until golden. 5. Serve warm.

recipes.name: Chapati ğŸ«“
recipes.steps: 1. Mix flour and salt. 2. Slowly add water, knead 5â€“7 min until smooth. 3. Rest 15â€“20 min. 4. Divide dough, roll thin. 5. Cook 1â€“2 min per side on hot skillet. 6. Serve warm.

recipes.name: Masala Tea â˜•
recipes.steps: 1. Boil water with cardamom. 2. Add tea leaves, simmer 2 min. 3. Add milk, sugar; bring to boil. 4. Strain and serve.

recipes.name: Fruit Salad ğŸğŸ‰ğŸŒ
recipes.steps: 1. Combine fruits. 2. Drizzle lemon juice. 3. Toss gently. 4. Chill 10 min, serve.

recipes.name: Sweet Potatoes ğŸ
recipes.steps: 1. Peel and cut sweet potatoes. 2. Boil water, add salt. 3. Add sweet potatoes, cook 15â€“20 min until tender. 4. Drain, serve warm.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry ğŸ¥¦ğŸ¥•
recipes.steps: 1. Heat oil. 2. Add carrots and capsicum 3 min. 3. Add cabbage, salt; stir 5 min until tender-crisp. 4. Serve warm.

recipes.name: Beef Stew ğŸ²
recipes.steps: 1. Heat oil; brown onions 2 min. 2. Add beef, cook until brown. 3. Add tomatoes, carrots, salt, pepper. 4. Add water, boil, simmer 45â€“60 min until beef tender. 5. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Fish Curry ğŸŸ
recipes.steps: 1. Heat oil, sautÃ© onions until soft. 2. Add tomatoes, curry powder, cook 3 min. 3. Add fish, coat with spices. 4. Add coconut milk, salt; simmer 10â€“12 min. 5. Serve with rice.

recipes.name: Mandazi ğŸ©
recipes.steps: 1. Mix flour, sugar, yeast. 2. Add coconut milk, knead 5 min. 3. Cover, rise 45 min. 4. Roll, cut, heat oil. 5. Deep fry until golden. 6. Serve warm.

recipes.name: Coconut Bean Stew ğŸ¥¥ğŸ¥˜
recipes.steps: 1. Heat oil, sautÃ© onions 2 min. 2. Add tomatoes, cook 3 min. 3. Add beans, coconut milk; simmer 10 min. 4. Season with salt. 5. Serve.

recipes.name: Milk Tea ğŸ«–
recipes.steps: 1. Boil water. 2. Add tea, simmer 2 min. 3. Add milk, sugar; boil 1 min. 4. Strain and serve hot.

recipes.name: Rice and Beans ğŸšğŸ¥˜
recipes.steps: 1. Cook rice until done. 2. Heat oil, sautÃ© onions 2 min. 3. Add beans, salt; stir 5 min. 4. Serve over rice.

recipes.name: Cabbage Stir Fry ğŸ¥¬
recipes.steps: 1. Heat oil. 2. Add cabbage, carrot; stir 6â€“8 min. 3. Add salt. 4. Serve warm.

recipes.name: Chapati Rolls ğŸ«“ğŸŒ¯
recipes.steps: 1. Lay chapati flat. 2. Spread mayo, add meat and veggies. 3. Roll tightly. 4. Serve warm.

recipes.name: Mango Smoothie ğŸ¥­ğŸ¥›
recipes.steps: 1. Blend all ingredients until smooth. 2. Serve immediately cold.

recipes.name: Porridge ğŸ²
recipes.steps: 1. Boil water and salt. 2. Slowly stir in maize flour. 3. Cook 8â€“12 min, stir constantly. 4. Add sugar, serve.

recipes.name: Banana Fritters ğŸŒ
recipes.steps: 1. Mix bananas, flour, sugar, cinnamon. 2. Heat oil. 3. Drop spoonfuls, fry till golden. 4. Drain and serve warm.

recipes.name: Beef Samosas ğŸ¥Ÿ
recipes.steps: 1. Cook beef, onions, curry until browned. 2. Fill wrappers. 3. Seal edges. 4. Fry till golden. 5. Serve warm.

recipes.name: Vegetable Curry ğŸ¥•ğŸ¥¦
recipes.steps: 1. Heat oil, sautÃ© onions. 2. Add curry powder 1 min. 3. Add vegetables 5 min. 4. Add coconut milk, simmer 15 min. 5. Serve with rice.

recipes.name: Nyama Choma ğŸ¥©
recipes.steps: 1. Marinate meat with salt, pepper. 2. Grill over medium heat 15â€“20 min until cooked. 3. Serve with kachumbari.

recipes.name: Kachumbari ğŸ¥—
recipes.steps: 1. Mix all ingredients in bowl. 2. Toss gently. 3. Chill 5 min and serve.

recipes.name: Matumbo Stew ğŸ¥˜
recipes.steps: 1. Boil tripe until tender. 2. Heat oil, sautÃ© onions, add tomatoes 3 min. 3. Add tripe, season, simmer 10 min. 4. Serve warm.

recipes.name: Omelette ğŸ¥š
recipes.steps: 1. Beat eggs with milk and salt. 2. Heat oil, cook eggs until set. 3. Serve warm.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato Mash ğŸ
recipes.steps: 1. Boil sweet potatoes 15 min. 2. Mash with butter and salt. 3. Serve warm.

recipes.name: Matoke (Steamed Bananas) ğŸŒ
recipes.steps: 1. Peel bananas, cut into halves. 2. Steam or boil 15â€“20 min until soft. 3. Heat oil, sautÃ© onion, mix with bananas. 4. Add salt and serve.

recipes.name: Cabbage and Potato Stew ğŸ¥¬ğŸ¥”
recipes.steps: 1. Heat oil, sautÃ© onion 2 min. 2. Add tomatoes, cook 3 min. 3. Add cabbage and potatoes, cover, simmer 15â€“20 min. 4. Add salt and serve.

recipes.name: Beef and Spinach Stew ğŸ¥©ğŸ¥¬
recipes.steps: 1. Heat oil, brown beef 5 min. 2. Add onions and cook 2 min. 3. Add tomatoes, simmer 5 min. 4. Add spinach, cook 5â€“7 min. 5. Add salt, serve hot.

recipes.name: Vegetable Fried Rice ğŸšğŸ¥¦ğŸ¥•
recipes.steps: 1. Heat oil, sautÃ© onion 2 min. 2. Add carrots and peas, cook 3 min. 3. Add rice, stir 5 min. 4. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Serve warm.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry ğŸ—
recipes.steps: 1. Heat oil, brown chicken 5 min. 2. Add onions, sautÃ© 2 min. 3. Add tomatoes, curry 3 min. 4. Pour coconut milk, simmer 20 min. 5. Serve with rice.

recipes.name: Vegetable Soup ğŸ¥¦ğŸ¥•
recipes.steps: 1. Heat oil, sautÃ© onion 2 min. 2. Add tomato, cook 3 min. 3. Add cabbage, carrots, water, simmer 10â€“15 min. 4. Add salt and serve.

recipes.steps: 1. Boil water, add salt. 2. Gradually stir in maize flour, cook 8â€“10 min. 3. Add milk and sugar, simmer 5 min. 4. Serve warm.

recipes.name: Boiled Eggs ğŸ¥š
recipes.steps: 1. Place eggs in saucepan, cover with water. 2. Boil 8â€“10 min for hard-boiled. 3. Cool and serve.

recipes.name: Chicken Pilau ğŸ›ğŸ—
recipes.steps: 1. Heat oil, brown chicken 5 min. 2. SautÃ© onion 2 min. 3. Add pilau masala, stir. 4. Add rice, water, and salt. 5. Boil, cover, simmer 18â€“20 min. 6. Fluff and serve.
